title: Punkline
creator_credit: Tony Stevens, Sue Davis and Kali Productions
brief_description: Shot at the Crystal Ballroom and Festival Hall during performances of the B 52’s, The Cure, La Femme and The Models, this film provides an observation not of the New Wave performers, but of the people who go to see them. Soundtrack from a tape by Equal Local.
